availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Married Married Sarah Metcalf Chapman on September 19, 1852 in Carroll County. Carpenter in Carroll County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District No. 2, p. 212. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District No. 2, p. 41. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), Microfilm rolls #994027-994058, KDLA, Carroll County marriages, 1852, p. 1. Find A Grave, "George W. Chapman (1822 - 1877)," Memorial #19251018, https://findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=19251018 (accessed May 17, 2017.
